title: 17th SAARC Summit: Sri Lanka funds to construct roads in Maldives
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by Sudath Silva) President Mahinda Rajapaksa laid a foundation stone with his Maldivian counterpart Mohamed Nasheed to inaugurate the construction of a concrete Road joining two areas of Addu city in Maldives yesterday on 09 November. The Government of Sri Lanka funds this construction project which joins two…
